name: Aerodactyl
flavorText:
A Pokémon that roamed the skies
in the dinosaur era. Its teeth are
like saw blades.

previous.name: Kabutops
previous.flavorText:
Its sleek shape is
perfect for swim­
ming. It slashes prey with its
claws and drains
the body fluids.

next.name: Snorlax
next.flavorText:
Very lazy. Just
eats and sleeps.
As its rotund bulk builds, it
becomes steadily
more slothful.
